description:
Kokkuri-san has been feeling someone`s passionate gaze for a few days. It turns out the gaze belongs to Tama the cat spirit. Tama`s exceptional love for dolls causes her to fall in love at first sight with Kohina and was waiting for an opportunity to acquire her. Once Tama gets her hands on Kohina, her abnormal doll play begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cat God Tama`s Love at First Sight!
Le coup de foudre de Tama, déesse-chat
